# The `PassBuilderPipelines.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file provides the implementation of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passbuilder">PassBuilder</a> based on our static pass registry as well as related functionality. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file provides the implementation of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passbuilder">PassBuilder</a> based on our static pass registry as well as related functionality.

It also provides helpers to aid in analyzing, debugging, and testing passes and pass pipelines.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// some function passes in between them. These can and should be removed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and/or replaced by scheduling the loop pass equivalents in the correct</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Specifically, &#96;SimplifyCFGPass&#96; and &#96;InstCombinePass&#96; are currently still</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Simplify the loop body. We do this initially to clean up after other loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// passes run, either when iterating on a loop or on inner loops with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implications on the outer loop.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Delete dead bit computations (instcombine runs after to fold away the dead</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// opportunities that creates).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">  FPM.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passmanager/#a3b988beeca0390fa8fa653d17bded384">addPass</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bdcepass">BDCEPass</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Run instcombine after redundancy and dead bit elimination to exploit</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For ThinLTO we must apply the context disambiguation decisions early, to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ensure we can correctly match the callsites to summary data.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These passes import type identifier resolutions for whole-program</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// devirtualization and CFI. They must run early because other passes may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// disturb the specific instruction patterns that these passes look for,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// creating dependencies on resolutions that may not appear in the summary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, GVN may transform the pattern assume(type.test) appearing in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// two basic blocks into assume(phi(type.test, type.test)), which would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transform a dependency on a WPD resolution into a dependency on a type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// identifier resolution for CFI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1768"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also, WPD has access to more precise information than ICP and can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1769"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// devirtualize more effectively, so it should operate on the IR first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1770"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1771"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The WPD and LowerTypeTest passes need to run at -O0 to lower type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1772"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// metadata and intrinsics.</span></CodeLine>
